attributes.action: Restore corroborative evidence in rape cases now
attributes.additional_details: This unfair bias against men in rape cases to try and get statistics up for the anti man female activist lobby is a sham and a travesty of justice too many [he said she said] cases are won often with no real evidence whatsoever and must stop ! GENTLEMEN get on this now there are millions of us we just need 100000 lets do this!!

rejection.details: Please rephrase to make the context clear eg evidence to be gathered in the course of the investigation, or evidence which is not admissable in court?
